    • loadReceptionistFromFile

      public static Reception loadReceptionistFromFile(int userID, String password, AppointmentManager appointmentManager, Map<String,Doctor> doctors, Inventory inventory)
      Loads a Receptionist from the staff file.
      Parameters:
      userID - Receptionist User ID
      password - Receptionist Password
      appointmentManager - AppointmentManager object
      doctors - Map of doctors
      inventory - Inventory object
      Returns:
      A Receptionist object if credentials are valid; otherwise, null
